fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - The Arctic Fox has a powerful grasp of the winter spirit. Once a night they may target a player and slow them down by one day, doing so delays all results they get by one day permanently(once per player).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If no other foxes are rolled yet, roll a Fox Beta.
- Can not perform the factional kill and use ability the same night.
